name: @rengine/python-adapters
description: Python adapters for Rengine - Qt GUI, Blender addon, and CLI tools

scripts.install:all: bun app-qt:install && bun blender:install && bun app-cli:install
scripts.test:all: bun app-qt:test && bun blender:test && bun app-cli:test
scripts.clean:all: bun app-qt:clean && bun blender:clean && bun app-cli:clean
scripts.app-qt:check: cd app-qt && python3 -m py_compile application/**/*.py && python3 -c "import application.main; print('✓ Import check passed')"
scripts.app-qt:clean: cd app-qt && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete
scripts.blender:install: cd blender && pip3 install -r requirements.txt 2>/dev/null || echo 'No requirements.txt found, using existing DragonFF'
scripts.blender:check: cd blender && python3 -c "import gtaLib.dff; import gtaLib.img; print('✓ DragonFF import check passed')"
scripts.blender:install:addon: cd blender && echo 'To install as Blender addon: Edit > Preferences > Add-ons > Install from File > select dragonff.zip'
scripts.blender:clean: cd blender && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete
scripts.app-cli:install: cd app-cli && pip3 install -r requirements.txt 2>/dev/null || echo 'CLI has no external dependencies'
scripts.app-cli:test: cd app-cli && python3 -c "import cli; print('✓ CLI import check passed')"
scripts.app-cli:check: cd app-cli && python3 -c "import cli; from cli import RengineCLI; print('✓ CLI functionality check passed')"
scripts.app-cli:clean: cd app-cli && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete
scripts.gta:test:img: cd app-cli && python3 cli.py img info /home/blefnk/Documents/reliverse/rengine/preloaded/resources/gta-sa/custom.img
scripts.gta:test:dff: cd app-cli && find /home/blefnk/Documents/reliverse/rengine/preloaded/resources/gta-sa -name '*.dff' -size -100k | head -1 | xargs python3 cli.py dff info
scripts.gta:test:batch: cd app-cli && python3 cli.py batch analyze /home/blefnk/Documents/reliverse/rengine/preloaded/resources/gta-sa --format dff --max-files 5
scripts.docker:build: echo 'Building Python environment...' && docker build -t rengine-python .

author: Rengine Team
